website_summaries.verdict: Our pick for highest strength abrasion resistance.
pros: Shoulders and elbows come with overlay panels and polyurethane armor to absorb impact
Windproof and waterproof to keep moisture out

customer_reviews.title: Great light weather jacket, nice protection and highly visible.
customer_reviews.text: From 50 degrees to 90 this jacket is very comfortable. With the lining out I'd feel comfortable at speed in this even above that temp. My only slight complaint is the liner retaining straps in the waist and one arm failed in the first couple of weeks of pulling it off. It looks sharp, is nicely ventilated and still plenty warm in the cooler temps. I haven't worn in the rain but it held up great in heavy fog with lots of humidity buildup it dried quickly and I stayed dry inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Great, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: After riding for a while with this jacket, it is just excellent. Got quite a bit of pocket room, an arm pocket for ID, and a liner to make wind and waterproof. It can be super airy and adjusted to fit well. The color is awesome, super visible. Main complaint, the armor feels not quite hard enough, but it works. It runs a bit small. I'm 6'2 and the XL feels short. Only 170lbs, so the rest is pretty roomy, but straps can make it fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket. Should not have listened to advice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Should not have listened to advice to buy one size up. Appears to be true to size, so buy the size you need. Update: I removed 2 stars as the zipper is difficult to operate. It requires fumbling to close the jacket. I would typically not remove 2 stars, but it really makes the jacket cumbersome to close. Update: figured out the zipper. It is a reversed (female?) zipper. Just had to hold the other side. Not sure why this is called a 'mens' jacket though.
customer_reviews.author: BikerPilot

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the value.
customer_reviews.text: I originally had bought a Joe Rocket Phoenix 5.0 Large, the jacket fit, but the pads didn't stay where they were supposed to. I then bought a Large Direct Air V3, but it was too big. (I am in between Large and Medium) I returned both the Joe Rocket P5.0 and Large Direct Air, and ordered a medium. Fits great. Sleeves bunch up a little on me, but otherwise has a better fit and look than the Joe Rocket, and costs 2/3 as much. Very pleased. The look is aggressive, but not as obnoxious as the Joe Rocket. I kinda felt like Ricky Bobby wearing that one.
customer_reviews.author: rsnumber2

customer_reviews.title: Not real armor
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was heavy with a warm zip out lining. The zipper kept splitting from the bottom up when closed. The armor was not armor, more like soft dense sponge and too small for the pocket it was put in since it kept moving around taking jacket on and off. I really wanted to like it but was disappointed after I bought a rocket jacket to compare armor. The rockets admire was hard and positioned where it should be. Loved the colors and jacket...but safety was my priority.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great summer jacket, stood up to 40 mph crash
customer_reviews.text: Coming back after a year of wear and riding. It's a great jacket for warmer weather, good down to about 55f with the windproof liner in it, past that I'd recommend something heavier. The number of pockets is great, as is the adjustability at the waist and arms. The mesh is very breathable, making summer rides at 90f pleasant. MOST IMPORTANTLY it held up when I low-sided my bike going about 40 mph! I was wearing this over a t-shirt, gloves and a full helmet and walked away with a bruise on my shoulder and road rash on my knee (I've since purchased armored jeans). While the jacket was trashed, I was fine. Thank you Pilot!
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Not for climates of 90 to 110 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very well made but I do not recommend it for climates of 90 to 110 degrees farenheith, really with the heat of the motorcycle and the ambient temperature is an oven, they should make them 2 zipper forward and another 2 backwards for the air to flow. With regard to security, it is seen that it will withstand impacts and will not hurt your skin when being dragged because of an accident, I want to buy another one of this but I think it due to the heat that you have with it
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket... crap zipper
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket and the design features are well thought out. Various pocket locations are handy. My biggest gripe about this jacket (as others have mentioned) the main zipper is stubborn to engage. I really stuggle trying to feed the zipper pull throught the zipper tab. Seems like a no brainer, but the GD thing does not feed well at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: hexacat

customer_reviews.title: This jacket checks all the right boxes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this jacket! The fit is excellent. The rain liner zipped out with no problem. It covers all of the bases for me: great protection, very visible, rain protection, looks great, does not flap at highway speeds and all at a great price. I rode yesterday in 90+ degree weather and very humid and the air circulation through the jacket kept me perfectly comfortable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: hedi

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's related, but I've broken out a few times while using this. Padding is not supposed to come in contact with skin, but I have them tucked into the pockets provided. All I wear is a t-shirt when using this, but added clothing is counter productive when it's ventilation is meant to cool. you on hot days?????? I could have gotten a size larger as well. It fits, but snug.
customer_reviews.author: vorlando

customer_reviews.title: There’s not a problem with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: So, everyone is 5 Stars. The few 1 or 2 stars keep talking about the zipper. Motorcycle jackets are not like a regular jacket. You might think you’re a large but really you are XXL. Who knows. Take your time with any zipper. A motorcycle zipper can’t fail in a fall. Just zip up in slow motion.
customer_reviews.author: 13CHANNELS

customer_reviews.title: Too hot in summer/too much black
customer_reviews.text: Good looking jacket but a bit short at the waist. i am 6' 3''. Felt comfortable with elbow/shoulder/back pads but too much black for summer riding. Got hot real quick even when moving. Went with Xelement CF 6019 instead - cooler, longer at waist and higher vis.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great Hi Viz Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very visible. Runs a bit small, I ordered the next size up and it fit perfectly... Update... I like this jacket more every time I wear it. It's great in warm and cool weather without the liner. With the liner should work for cold weather as well. I've been riding for over 40 years, and I'm amazed at how people "See me" now. I never thought "Hi Viz" would make such a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, features, design at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for; a quality product with the features I was looking for, under $200. Sizing is close to recommended. I'm 5' 8" and 180 lbs, 45" chest, 32" waist; i generally have difficulty finding anything that really fits me out of the box. The XL fits perfect on my upper portion. I will take in material in the mid to lower section. (10 minutes on the sewing machine) The elbow pockets need a little stitching to hold the elbow armor in place. (they drift down the forearms almost past elbows) The liner zips in nicely and installs easily. This jacket has a quality look and feel about it. I would recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: John Steffens

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Jacket wears comfortably. I got a size Large and am a 185lb 6' 2" athletically built male. I'm happy with the purchase. Zipper and stitching appears to be of good quality. I had to return it because of a premature break of the zipper and button holding th me liner on. Amazon return was quick and easy. Replacement is holding together well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket looks great, seems to be really well-made, and feels very durable. I've been wearing it in 90 degree, humid weather, and it does get warm when I'm standing still, but the mesh breathes beautifully as soon as I start riding. The extra padding on the back, shoulders, and elbows makes me feel a lot safer at speed. For fit, I'm 6'0" and 210lbs and the XL fit me perfectly with a just enough room for more layers underneath when the weather cools down. Even though it's a short waist-length jacket, the little bit of extra length in the back keeps my back fully covered even when I'm leaning forward.
customer_reviews.author: Alan DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but it didn't keep me dry in a a hard rain.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Fits perfectly. Padding is sturdy. Great ventilation even on 90 degree day. While on the Pennsylvania Turnpike last Friday, I found myself in the middle of a driving rainstorm. The jacket provided no protection against the rain. I was thoroughly soaked. Rain soaked through my t-shirt, boxers, jeans and clear down to my socks. I was wearing rain pants designed for motorcycle riding and that helped to keep me from getting completely soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis A. Soltis

customer_reviews.title: No Road Rash at 60 MPH Crash
customer_reviews.text: 1/24/19 a person pulled in front of me while traveling on a highway. I hit her doing 60MPH. I suffered broken bones but no road rash. I’m recovering as of this review but police and doctors tell me I wouldn’t be if I wasn’t wearing all the protective gear. FYI - my cell phone was in my breast pocket and didn’t break or sustain a scratch, WOW!! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deal

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful jacket. I ordered a 3X because other jackets I ordered not this brand we're all too tight. This one fits well is well-designed obviously but the sleeves are on the long side for me. I will return this jack up and get one size smaller because I really like this style jacket
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Rose

customer_reviews.title: A lotta bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality jacket with all the right features. I haven't used it yet since it's Feburary but it'll be hotter than Hadies soon here in the Cali central valley. My only concern it that I'm somewhat long waisted and I wish that the jacket was just a little longer. You may want to offer it in tall sizes if there's enough demand. The sizing is pretty close to what it's listed at. I'm 6 feet and 235lbs with a 48" chest and 38" waist,and the 2XL was about right in proportions for me other than the length. A few of my friends have your leather suits and they're some of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: RC51Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super small fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, adequate padding and very bright. However, I’m 6’3 and ordered the XL, when I opened the box I thought amazon sent me a medium, I checked the tag and it said XL, I tried it on and it stopped at my belly button, going to be returning it but wish it would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking jacket! Plenty of pockets. Mesh lets air flow through. The flex armor is very comfortable (I also bought the chest protector insert, which fits perfectly. ) Quality product, shipped fast. I would definitely buy again from this seller. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is the best jacket for cool to warm (hot) weather everywere I go others wil complement the jacket and try it on
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ordered one size up and it fits perfect not to tight which is what I wanted It has padding and not hard armorer. The inside liner unzips which includes the sleeves has reflective strips on the back. It is mesh and in southern Cal it is perfect even in 90 + degree weather (liner is out of course) Now how to wash or clean it and I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is fine, but
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is fine, but.. I ordered in the early spring, and did not wear it until too late to return it. The zipper has never stayed zipped. I don't know if it is this particular zipper, or all of the zippers in all of these jackets. I paid to have a zipper pull replaced, but that has not fixed the problem. I would like one of these that the zipper works on.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert A. Day

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this jacket yesterday. I bought one size larger than I usually wear, and the fit was perfect. Took off from DC at 6 this morning and put in 440 miles on the bike today, including two rain showers. With the liner out, I was comfortable all day at 92 degrees. With the liner in, I ran through two rain showers and stayed completely dry. Overall, an awesome jacket for a reasonable price... Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver and it's perfect. A bit stiff during the first couple rides, but it keeps you warm, doesn't overheat you,and has amazing perforated ventilation. It has a ton of pockets, then you remove the liner and EVEN MORE POCKETS. The one on the wrist is the best, since I have to show military ID going to work every morning. Great jacket, but you'll need to buy real armor. I think it has a couple napkins in the armor pockets.....
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It fits and feels great! Jacket is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Pilot Motosport Direct Air Mesh jacket in XL. The fit was true to size. It fits and feels great! Jacket is very comfortable. Liner insert does not make the jacket waterproof but I can ride in steady rain for hours and have a damp shirt, not dripping wet just damp. Without the liner the jacket is comfortable in 95 degree weather, as long as you don't have to stop for extended periods. I love this jacket
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Motorcycle Jacket.  Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket. I ordered the XXL I am 260lbs 5ft 11". It fit perfectly. Pads were great in elbows shoulder and back. Lots of pockets. I highly recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Smith

customer_reviews.title: Visibility & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Jacket comfortable. Been wearing all summer with Temp in mid-high 80's & did not get hot unless on an extended stop. High-vis without being all-yellow. Recommend sizing up if you plan on wearing anything other than a t-shirt or tight base layer. . I'm normally Lg(t-shirts) to XL (sweatshirts) and this XX jacket fit a little loose w/T-shirt but perfect when I wear a sweatshirt for cool AM rides
customer_reviews.author: J Buc

customer_reviews.title: Good Spring Fall to early Winter jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable jacket in Fall/Early spring. Not warm enough for Winter without some electrics even with the rain liner in. It's just a bit to bulky with the armor in it for Summer riding for me. It has good adjustability and is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable jacket. Used it through Summer 2018 up until when this review was written. Normal commute to work use. Lasted about 3200 miled until the liner ripped and zippers snapped. Cant use it now. I guess you get what you pay for. I upgraded to a Joe Rocket body suit. Much better, and with heavy duty zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: a great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Best jacket I've owned, especially for warmer weather. It breathes really well unlike almost every other jacket I've owned. Surprisingly, it also does well in cold weather. In winter weather here in N Virginia, I added the rain-proof liner and this turned into a great cold weather jacket. a great value also. Will get one for my wife. No complaints for the first 2 months of daily use. Sizes a little small. I wear L clothing (6', 195 lbs), XL fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Great warm weather jacket!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased the XL based on other comments but it was way too big. I was swimming in it. I am 6 feet and 185 lbs. I returned it no problem got the large fits great. The jackets seem to be high quality and great features. But most importantly the cooling aspect of this jacket works great. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, sent wrong size, twice!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It looks and feels of great quality. But for the SECOND time ordering it, I still received the wrong size. I ordered medium and received a large. This jacket is meant to fit me a particular way. It’s meant to protect me if and when I wipe out. Pilot, how come you cannot get my order right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great jacket at an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am super happy with the overall quality of this jacket. I use it typically in evening on my scooter. Folds up nicely under the seat as well. It not only protects you physically, but increases your visibility. There is really nothing I do not like about the jacket and I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper 2111

customer_reviews.title: nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice riding jacket but.... its extremely hot even without the liner ive been riding in 90 degree weather so its not the best for that on a 65 70 degree day it would be perfect.... not sure though if this is machine washable
customer_reviews.author: BLAKE

customer_reviews.title: So far this an amazing jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far this an amazing jacket for the price. Was out riding in 90 degree weather last week and you can feel the airflow very well. Definitely order a size larger than normal. Especially if you will be wearing the waterproof liner. I normally wear a xl but the sleeves were short and the chest was tight. I and 6'01 215 chest size 44 and the XL was very tight. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Check your size before selecting your buy. It feels unnatural to buy a very important piece of your ride without trying it on but I took the chance and it is for sure worth’s try.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: Looks, feels and fits great. Two reasons for not giving it 5 stars; the liner is not waterproof, and one of the liner sleeve retention loops ripped the first time I removed the liner. It does have good ventilation though.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Cool Styling, The Better 2see U My Dear!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket sized correctly. I have longer arms, so sleeves were about an inch short 4me. Gauntlet Gloves solved that. Comfortable wear, good ventilation, 👍 great visibility in stylish form. Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Bru-sky

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good riding jacket for the money. Plenty of pockets for storage. I don’t consider it a cold weather jacket even with the liner inside. It is more of a three season jacket but I don’t do any winter riding anyway. The material seems to be high quality and the hi viz yellow really makes me stand out in traffic.
customer_reviews.author: BSB

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for warm weather riding.
customer_reviews.text: Really well fitting jacket that breathes great for the summer. I would not use it in cold weather. Incredible value for the money. I went and purchased the pilot mesh pants as well after experiencing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It comes SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I always li!e to order one size bigger for extra comfort. So since I am a large I ordered an xl. I would highly recommend an xxl at the bare min. Also I am 6ft and the bottom of the jacket barely comes to my waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits great. I'm 5'10", 170 lbs medium fits well. Had a slight issue with shipping, but seller made it right.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pilot hit the mark with this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good even with the liner; 5’6”, 230lb. I selected the XL hi-vis Black/yellow. Am comfortable with out the liner from mid 50f to a humid 90f. I suspect I’ll be comfortable with the liner and a flannel shirt down to about 40f. I ride a BMW K1200S with a tank bag so no need for large pockets. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good new england 3 season jacket
customer_reviews.text: I wear this together with a hi viz bilt modular helmut and received several positive comments. No traffic incidents. Jacket is comfortable and true to size shorter in the front makes for comfortable kong rides. Good ventalation used with a t shirt only 50-90 deg new england days. Plenty of pockets. Update- Zipper failed/broke after 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome motorcycle jacket, very comfortable in different weather conditions, water proof, love it!
customer_reviews.author: ALZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat
customer_reviews.text: Road 100 plus miles today through Hells canyon on gravel and pavement it was 104 degrees and I was still not to hot awesome coat felt protected and safer than a T-shirt
customer_reviews.author: Try guy$

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Weather Jacket
customer_reviews.text: A great motorcycle jacket for warmer weather. The nylon mesh allows plenty of air flow, and the black color doesn't reflect in the motorcycle screen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for Fall usage
customer_reviews.text: Not a lightweight Summer jacket unless your Summer is less than eighty degrees
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Runs about one full size small. Had to return xl and order 2xl from pilot. It fits perfectly. Replaced back armor. Liner for cooler weather , take it out for hot days, flows plenty of air.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket for the $. Fits as it should. Ventilated very well
customer_reviews.author: stethescope

customer_reviews.title: Great motorcycle jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jacket! Great fit, comfortable, breathes well with the liner removed, and feels well constructed. Plus it looks good and is very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Next size up
customer_reviews.text: If you order, order 1 size up from what you would normally wear 2 sizes up if putting over bulky clothing. I wish it was the correct size when I ordered. However, I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: High visibility and protection
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, looks attractive and feels protective. Medium weight, removable liner, cool enough for traffic riding.
customer_reviews.author: Rivadeneira Luis

customer_reviews.title: the more I like it. It's an outstanding value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The more I wear this jacket, the more I like it. It's an outstanding value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Amstutz

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Comforatble Fitting Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the look and fit of the jacket. I have only used it a few times but my initial impression is very positive. You can tell the armor is there but it works with the design of the coat to be somewhat visually discrete. It breaths well with the liner removed. I'm happy with the product and the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lord

customer_reviews.title: is actually cooler when wearing this, than just a ...
customer_reviews.text: is actually cooler when wearing this, than just a shirt. Air flow well through jacket, and keeps sun off the skin.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, 5'-10"- 225lbs- extra large fit snug
customer_reviews.text: Very durable fabric, nice quality, 5'-10"- 225lbs- extra large fit snug, jacket air flow is very good- on days over 90 degrees, you stay cool moving- traffic lights you will feel a little warm- definetly love the hi viz
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price paid. I would recommend this jacket to all riders.
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made and was cool at 80 degrees. Visibility is great Fit was better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice warm weather mesh jacket at a fair price. Zippers, buttons and armor all high quality. Fit as expected (XL for 6ft-1 and 210# male). Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DrMemory

customer_reviews.title: Beware The colors don’t match the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Was Not the color that was shown in the picture very disappointing. To much money to ship back. Basically I’m disappointed. Jacket seems fine except the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jwq

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I were 44 jacket and this fit just right. Nice weight, not too light, not too heavy. A nice compliment to my leather jacket. Water proofing liner is nice to have and easy to remove for warmer weather. Over all very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: FSterling

customer_reviews.title: Awsome deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. fit is excellent as well as ventilation. Perfect for Texas summers. Well made too!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Mine had no red accents, what was sent to me was just black and white.
customer_reviews.text: I have a red bike, a red helmet, I wanted a jacket with red on it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! Sizing seems accurate and he really likes the rainproof liner it comes with. I love the color - I can find him wherever we are!
customer_reviews.author: dianea

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable jacket and flows a lot of air. Nice visibility with the white front and back. Have not had anyone pull out in front of me when wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Jack White

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose, but the inner lining is held together by rather weak material and it started to come off with-in a month of easy use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seshasankaran

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and protective.
customer_reviews.text: Not too flashy or loud as most of these motorcycle jackets are. Fit well. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ran d

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and just in time for record-setting heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, and just in time for record-setting heat wave! The design does a great job regulating heat. While just wearing a t-shirt underneath the jacket, I'm very comfortable in 50 to 85 degree weather. Extreme is noticeable, but still very tolerable. I also like the right cuff zipper pocket and the easy to access inside pocket for phones and wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and love the high visibility
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and love the high visibility. I am 6 feet, 200 and ordered an XL. It fits well although the elbow pads are a little low so maybe a large would have been better. I wish the pads were adjustable for fit
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Orber xlarge and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It fit great the rain liner comes out it was sent real fast and looks great I would highly recommend this jacket has plunty of pocket snaps and zippers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: careful with sizing. my chest is 46, and the XL was WAY TOO SMALL. order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but bad sizes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality jacket but sizes are wrong. Mine came a size large.
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love the look the comfort and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love the look the comfort and the stirdiness of this jacket, very well put together and very impressed with how warm it keeps you. Very great fabric and padding and doesn’t make you feel too heavy in it, overall I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good Value for the Money. Well Made. Seems like it will provide good protection in the event of a crash
customer_reviews.author: Soylent Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of airflow in ultra high temps and good protection at same time
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Works to protect everything
customer_reviews.text: Had a crash at 65mph and this jacket saved me. No road rash, broken bones or serious damage. I have worn it a few times in the rain and never had any issues. Highly recommend this product for beginner riders
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Fat man in a little coat
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this jacket. It feels well made, and a lot of attention to detail for it in it's price point. The armor is soft and comfortable too. But going by the size chart it's way too small for me. I felt like Chris Farley doing fat man in a little coat. I'm 6'2", 210, average build. Little bit of a belly. Coat zipped up but not much room to spare. My biggest issue was length. The front only came to my belly button and the sleeves were a little tight. That was a size L. I'm thinking I need a XL or XXL, but I'm betting the XXL will be a good length but really baggy.
